body_html: I was responding to "the docs specify the default argument". While it should be specified explicitly, and I get deprecation errors if I do not, I am able to call those methods without an explicit dims argument in PyTorch 0.3.
body_text: I was responding to "the docs specify the default argument".  While it should be specified explicitly, and I get deprecation errors if I do not, I am able to call those methods without an explicit dims argument in PyTorch 0.3.
body: I was responding to "the docs specify the default argument".  While it should be specified explicitly, and I get deprecation errors if I do not, I am able to call those methods without an explicit `dims` argument in PyTorch 0.3.
